Package net.xqhs.flash.core

The package contains the core of Flash-MAS.
Author:
andreiolaru
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigurableEntity<P extends Entity<?>>
    This interface extends Entity with a method dedicated to configuring the entity, using a MultiTreeMap holding a tree of multi-maps.
    Entity<P extends Entity<?>>
    An element in the deployment, be it a support infrastructure, an agent, a shard, etc.
    Entity.EntityProxy<C extends Entity<?>>
    Marker interface for classes that provide a proxy to an entity which is an instance of C.
    Loader<T extends Entity<?>>
    A loader instance has the capability of creating new Entity instances.
    RunnableEntity<P extends Entity<?>>
    This version of Entity adds the method Runnable.run(), enabling whoever holds a reference to this entity to also control the thread on which the entity executes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CategoryName.CatPar
    Builder for category name parameters.
    DeploymentConfiguration
    This class manages deployment configurations.
    DeploymentConfiguration.CtxtTriple
    A node in the context stack.
    Entity.EntityIndex
    An index of all local entities, allowing the retrieval of a string in the form of type":"name"."index for any entity, just by providing a reference to the entity.
    Loader.SimpleLoader
    Simple implementation for Loader, which attempts to load the entity class by instantiating it: using a constructor that receives a MultiTreeMap as argument, or using the default constructor, and if the instance implements ConfigurableEntity, subsequently calling ConfigurableEntity.configure(net.xqhs.flash.core.util.MultiTreeMap).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CategoryName
    Types of categories in the configuration (some of which are entities).
    CategoryName.Is
    Values in this enumeration indicate whether a constraint is optional or mandatory.
    CategoryName.NameIs
    Values in this enumeration indicate whether entities in a category are uniquely identifiable by their name, if any.
    Loader.SearchItemType
    Type of item to be searched for by autoFind methods.
